Good fighting game which is a nice port of the console version. Much more simple, with oversimplified controls to make it mobile friendly: but those simplified controls don't always work. Tap works, swipe down works, but swipe up, back or forward feel sometimes a bit unresponsive, which can easily lead to frustration when the combo you're trying to make falls flat... Still from story to raids and online arena, there's a lot to do and a lot to unlock. A tad grindy but great nonetheless

The game was really good but it is now pausing when you are fighting. So if you have a very strong opponent that can instantly kill you, your game is over in about 2-3 seconds. Please make your game friendlier to your patrons who grind without greasing your greedy palms. I know profit is important but not to the extent where players who rely on effort and grinding suffers. I have been playing Injustice 2 for a year and I will say this: This is the best game made by Netherrealm Studios. The graphics are great, I enjoy the character designs, and the game is incredibly fun. While I do find some flaws in the game (the AI opponents can get really difficult at times), I still enjoy it, nonetheless. Injustice 2 is very underrated/overhated and is better than Injustice 1, which is overrated in 2025. I think that the biggest reason why Injustice 2 is hated is nostalgia.
